actions.message:
Discord Hack Week is an annual event where artists can make Discord themed art. And bot makers (like me) can make bots in a competition for prizes.

So I made the bot as an entry.
Learn more [HERE](https://blog.discordapp.com/discord-community-hack-week-build-and-create-alongside-us-6b2a7b7bba33)
